thread.title: Rose Bowl, USC vs. Penn State score: Live blog, highlights, updates, stats
thread.title_full: Rose Bowl, USC vs. Penn State score: Live blog, highlights, updates, stats

author: Robby Kalland
title: Rose Bowl, USC vs. Penn State score: Live blog, highlights, updates, stats
text:
21m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Penn State feel jilted that its tremendous play late in the season did not earn the team a trip to the College Football Playoff, but the Rose Bowl is still a tremendous accomplishment for a Nittany Lions team that was on the verge of being a title contender this season. 
As often happens, USC will be the one welcoming Penn State to Pasadena, California, for probably the most anticipated non-playoff game of the bowl season. PSU won its final nine games of the season, taking down Ohio State and Wisconsin along the way, and has scored 38 or more points in its last six games. The Trojans bounced back from an awful 1-3 start to win eight straight to close the season. They have scored 36 or more points in five of their last six games with the lone exception being a 26-13 road takedown of playoff semifinal loser Washington . Expect lots of points and tons of fun early Monday evening. 
It all goes down at 5 p.m. ET live from the Rose Bowl. CBS Sports will be with you the entire way with score updates, highlights and commentary from the game. If the live blog below does not load for you, please click here to view it. 
Thanks for stopping by.
